channel.title: [317 PI] Connection Error - Retrying in #
channel.description:
I just made my client into a JAR file, but whenever i start it as a [i].Jar[/i] file, it shows this on the [u]title screen[/u]: [b][i]("Connection error - Retrying in #")[/i][/b]
When i run the client from the [i]raw files[/i] though, it starts up [u]perfectly[/u].
Any help?
[size=24pt][font=georgia][u][b]::JAR MAKER SETTINGS::[/b][/u][/font] [font=impact]Main-Class: client JAR Compression Rate: 9 Exclude Extensions: java;jar;bat;zip;psd;bmp[/font][/size]

item.title: [317 PI] Connection Error - Retrying in #
item.dc:creator: @Maleficent Maleficent
item.description:
@Maleficent wrote:

I just made my client into a JAR file, but whenever i start it as a .Jar file, it shows this on the title screen:
(“Connection error - Retrying in #”)

When i run the client from the raw files though, it starts up perfectly.

Any help?

[size=24pt][font=georgia]::JAR MAKER SETTINGS::[/font]
[font=impact]Main-Class: client
JAR Compression Rate: 9
Exclude Extensions: java;jar;bat;zip;psd;bmp[/font][/size]

Read full topic
